name: Trainwreck (PeaQueueAre, twrk, andrewoid)
description:
Ladies and gentlemen: we are delayed because of train traffic ahead of us. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Due to a conductor falling asleep, all of the trains have been derailed. Avoid crashing into any of the other trains, and use the items from the detached carts to your advantage.

2 Players required to play
